value: Our King and Savior draweth nigh: O come, let us adore him.

data.label: On the Twelve Days of Christmas
value: Alleluia. Unto us a child is born: O come, let us adore him. Alleluia.

data.label: From the Epiphany through the Baptism of Christ, and on the Feasts of the Transfiguration and Holy Cross
value: The Lord hath manifested forth his glory: O come, let us adore him.
The Lord is full of compassion and mercy: O come, let us adore him.
data.label: In Lent
From Easter Day until the Ascension
value: Alleluia. The Lord is risen indeed: O come, let us adore him. Alleluia.

data.label: From Ascension Day until the Day of Pentecost
value: Alleluia. Christ the Lord ascendedeth into heaven: O come, let us adore him. Alleluia.

data.label: On the Day of Pentecost
value: Alleluia. The Spirit of the Lord filleth the world: O come, let us adore him. Alleluia.
Father, Son, and Holy Spirit, one God: O come, let us adore him.
data.label: On Trinity Sunday

value: The earth is the Lord’s for he made it: O come, let us adore him.
Worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness: O come, let us adore him.
The mercy of the Lord is everlasting: O come, let us adore him.
[Alleluia.] The Lord is glorious in his saints: O come, let us adore him. [Alleluia.]
category: On All Saints and other Major Saints’ Days
